segment.source: Configuring the MBAM 2.5 Server Features

segment.source: Use this information as a starting place for configuring Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) 2.5 Server features after Installing the MBAM 2.5 Server Software.
segment.target: Use this information as a starting place for configuring Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) 2.5 Server features after Installing the MBAM 2.5 Server Software.

segment.source: There are two methods you can use to configure MBAM:
segment.target: There are two methods you can use to configure MBAM:

segment.source: MBAM Server Configuration wizard
segment.target: MBAM Server Configuration wizard

segment.source: Windows PowerShell cmdlets
segment.target: Windows PowerShell cmdlets

segment.target: Before you start configuring MBAM Server features
